body:
Hey guys, I'm Tully incase ya didn't know and I am a small Aussie youtuber who plays on Avicus, if your a regular user you probably know me.

I have 300+ subs on youtube and I have decided to make a series called "The Avicus Show" Where I basically play a random minigame on avicus with a different featuring guest everytime.

channel link -> https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiGZgsyBcAhaRGgESpF6Fsw

It helps me interact a lot more with the avicus community and my fans, and gain more because I dont have too much of a fanbase on Avicus and I've been really lazy with uploading Avicus videos lately.

Requirements (They arent hard to meet)

* You must have a skype account with an okay quality headset/mic

This is only because my viewers will get annoyed if there is static in my videos (Sorry)

* You must be able to play  (duh)

Thats basically it, Um so yeah guys if you want to record with me or anything and feature on the Avicus show please add me on skype: TheDiamondGecko

Peace <3
